DOC.brief_summary: Patients with hereditary haemochromatosis will be interviewed/questioned about their Quality of life and the delivered quality of care in the hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Implications for Quality of Life and Quality of Care in Patients With Hereditary Haemochromatosis
DOC.criteria: phase 1: experts in the field of haemochromatosis (hepatologists, hematologists, endocrinologists, general practitioner, nurses, ...) phase 2: patients with hereditary haemochromatosis, treatment with phlebotomy since 3 months, Dutch/English speaking patients with secundary iron overload phlebotomy treatment less than 3 months language: no Dutch or English
